00034 #include "btkParticle.h"

00041 // ITK includes
00042 #include "itkPoint.h"

00045 namespace btk
00046 {
00047 
00048 Particle::Particle(Point p)
00049         : m_points(1,p)
00050 {
00051     m_outside = false;
00052     m_active  = true;
00053 }
00054 
00055 void Particle::setWeight(Real w)
00056 {
00057     assert(w >= 0);
00058     assert(w <= 1);
00059 
00060     m_weight.push_back(w);
00061 }
00062 
00063 char Particle::addToPath(Vector v, Mask::Pointer mask)
00064 {
00065     Point p = this->lastPoint()+v;
00066 
00067     char isIn = this->IsInside(p, mask);
00068 
00069     if(isIn == 0 || isIn == 2)
00070     {
00071         m_points.push_back(p);
00072         m_vectors.push_back(v);
00073         m_outside = true;
00074     }
00075     else if(isIn == 1)
00076     {
00077         m_points.push_back(p);
00078         m_vectors.push_back(v);
00079     }
00080 
00081     return isIn;
00082 }
00083 
00084 Real Particle::weight() const
00085 {
00086     return m_weight.back();
00087 }
00088 
00089 void Particle::SetLastWeight(Real w)
00090 {
00091     assert(w >= 0);
00092     assert(w <= 1);
00093 
00094     m_weight[m_weight.size()-1] = w;
00095 }
00096 
00097 Point Particle::lastPoint() const
00098 {
00099     return m_points.back();
00100 }
00101 
00102 void Particle::SetLastPoint(Point p)
00103 {
00104     m_points[m_points.size()-1] = p;
00105 }
00106 
00107 Vector Particle::lastVector() const
00108 {
00109     return m_vectors.back();
00110 }
00111 
00112 void Particle::SetLastVector(Vector v)
00113 {
00114     m_vectors[m_vectors.size()-1] = v;
00115 }
00116 
00117 Point Particle::getPoint(unsigned int i) const
00118 {
00119     assert(i>=0);
00120     assert(i<m_points.size());
00121 
00122     return m_points[i];
00123 }
00124 
00125 Vector Particle::getVector(unsigned int i) const
00126 {
00127     assert(i>=0);
00128     assert(i<m_vectors.size());
00129 
00130     return m_vectors[i];
00131 }
00132 
00133 Real Particle::getWeight(unsigned int i) const
00134 {
00135     assert(i>=0);
00136     assert(i<m_weight.size());
00137 
00138     return m_weight[i];
00139 }
00140 
00141 void Particle::addLikelihood(Real likelihood)
00142 {
00143     m_likelihood.push_back(likelihood);
00144 }
00145 
00146 Real Particle::getLikelihood(unsigned int k) const
00147 {
00148     assert(k>=0);
00149     assert(k<m_likelihood.size());
00150 
00151     return m_likelihood[k];
00152 }
00153 
00154 unsigned int Particle::length() const
00155 {
00156     assert(m_points.size() == m_vectors.size()+1);
00157     assert(m_vectors.size() == m_weight.size());
00158 
00159     return m_vectors.size();
00160 }
00161 
00162 bool Particle::isOutside()
00163 {
00164     return m_outside;
00165 }
00166 
00167 bool Particle::isActive()
00168 {
00169     return m_active;
00170 }
00171 
00172 void Particle::setActive(bool active)
00173 {
00174     m_active = active;
00175 }
00176 
00177 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, Particle p)
00178 {
00179     os << p.m_weight.back() << " " << p.m_points.size() << " ";
00180 
00181     std::vector<Point>::iterator it;
00182     for(it = p.m_points.begin(); it != p.m_points.end(); it++)
00183         os << (*it) << " ";
00184 
00185     os << std::endl;
00186 
00187     return os;
00188 }
00189 
00190 char Particle::IsInside(Point p, Mask::Pointer mask)
00191 {
00192     Mask::IndexType index;
00193     index[0] = std::floor(p.x() + 0.5);
00194     index[1] = std::floor(p.y() + 0.5);
00195     index[2] = std::floor(p.z() + 0.5);
00196 
00197     MaskRegion region = mask->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00198 
00199     char isIn = 0;
00200 
00201     if(index[0] >= 0 && index[0] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(0) &&
00202        index[1] >= 0 && index[1] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(1) &&
00203        index[2] >= 0 && index[2] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(2))
00204         isIn = mask->GetPixel(index);
00205 
00206     return isIn;
00207 }
00208 
00209 } // namespace btk
